text: West Dunbartonshire (; ) is one of the 32 council areas of Scotland, UK. The administrative centre is Dumbarton. West Dunbartonshire borders Argyll and Bute, East Dunbartonshire, Renfrewshire and Stirling. == Towns and villages == * Alexandria * Balloch * Bonhill * Bowling * Clydebank * Dalmuir * Drumry * Dumbarton * Duntocher * Faifley * Gartocharn * Hardgate * Jamestown * Linnvale * Milton * Old Kilpatrick * Renton * Whitecrook
title: West Dunbartonshire
